intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) serves as the primary resource for users of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) High Resolution Layer (HRL) Grasslands product. It details the product's characteristics, production methodologies, and quality assessment procedures for the annual HRL Grasslands provision. The document also covers terms of use, product access, technical support, and potential applications, providing a comprehensive guide for effectively utilising the HRL Grasslands data.
keywords: Land Use, Land Use Change and Forestry
